title: Supervised Learning
subject: Data Science
theory:
In Supervised learning, we map Input X to Output Y.
- **Regression**: Y is continuous (Price, Temp).
- **Classification**: Y is categorical (Spam/Ham, Cat/Dog).

common_mistakes.correction: Predicting a class as 1.5 doesn't make sense. Use Logistic Regression or Classifiers.

exam_notes: Most common form of ML in industry.
summary: Supervised learning is the workhorse of enterprise AI.
